languages.text: "Мой тебе совет — завязывай с контрабандой и займись Футфолом. Иначе все же угодишь в петлю".
"A word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."
languages.original_text: "Мой тебе совет — завязывай с контрабандой и займись Футфолом. Иначе все же угодишь в петлю".

traits.locale_text: "Word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."
"Word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."

languages.text: “给你个建议：别再走私了，好好照顾落脚港，否则你早晚有一天会被送上绞架。”
languages.original_text: "A word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."

traits.locale_text: “给你个建议：别再走私了，好好照顾落脚港，否则你早晚有一天会被送上绞架。”

languages.text: 「一言助言だ。密輸は辞め、代わりにフットフォールの世話をしろ。さもなければ、結局は絞首台行きだ」
languages.original_text: "A word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."

traits.locale_text: 「一言助言だ。密輸は辞め、代わりにフットフォールの世話をしろ。さもなければ、結局は絞首台行きだ」

languages.text: «Un consejo: Deje el contrabando y ocúpese de Paso. O al final acabará en la horca».
languages.original_text: "A word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."

traits.locale_text: «Un consejo: Deje el contrabando y ocúpese de Paso. O al final acabará en la horca».

languages.text: "Ein kleiner Rat: Gebt die Schmuggelei auf und kümmert Euch stattdessen um Footfall. Sonst endet Ihr doch noch am Galgen."
languages.original_text: "A word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."

traits.locale_text: "Ein kleiner Rat: Gebt die Schmuggelei auf und kümmert Euch stattdessen um Footfall. Sonst endet Ihr doch noch am Galgen."

languages.text: « Un bon conseil : abandonnez la contrebande et occupez-vous plutôt de Castel si vous ne voulez pas finir sur la potence. »
languages.original_text: "A word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."

traits.locale_text: « Un bon conseil : abandonnez la contrebande et occupez-vous plutôt de Castel si vous ne voulez pas finir sur la potence. »

languages.text: "Bir tavsiye: Kaçakçılığı bırak ve onun yerine Binliman'a göz kulak ol. Yoksa neticede sonun yine darağacı olur."
languages.original_text: "A word of advice: give up smuggling and take care of Footfall instead. Or you will end up on the gallows after all."

traits.locale_text: "Bir tavsiye: Kaçakçılığı bırak ve onun yerine Binliman'a göz kulak ol. Yoksa neticede sonun yine darağacı olur."
